oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Majmūʻah : manuscript, 1443-1473
Sharḥ Qaṣīdat Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1. Kitāb Luqṭat al-ʻajlān fī al-uṣūl / al-Zarkashī, 878 [1473] (ff. 1r-10v) -- 2. Sharḥ Qaṣīdat Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ (ff. 11r-20v) -- 3. Manẓūmah fī al-kitābah wa-al-tajwīd ṭarīqahu / li-Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Sinjārī (ff. 21r-25v) -- 4. Hādūr / Ibn Zuqqāʻah, 877 [1472-3] (ff. 26r-30v) -- 5. al-Waraqāt / Imām al-Ḥaramayn (ff. 31r-34r) -- 6. Sharḥ Yaqūlu al-ʻabd / lil-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn, 846 [1443] (ff. 37r-61r) -- 7. Kitāb Sharḥ al-Waraqāt / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī (ff. 62r-75v) -- 8. An untitled incomplete work on logic (ff. 76r-127v).

The first work in the collection completed on the last Friday of Jumādá al-Ūlá of the year 878 [October 1473] in Jāmiʻ al-Azhar. The other works, some of which are dated, all from 15th century except the last work, which appears to be from 17th-18th century.
MS Arab 389. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Imām al-Ḥaramayn al-Juwaynī, ʻAbd al-Malik ibn ʻAbd Allāh--1028-1085

Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
Hadith--Terminology
Islam--Doctrines
Logic
